import React from 'react' import '../../App.css' import '../../Styles/News.css' export default function NewsLastest(props) { const news = props.news return (
Blog chó và mèo
{ news &&
{ news[0] &&
{news[0].newCate}
{news[0].newTitle}
{news[0].newContent.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, '')}
read more...
} { news[1] &&
{news[1].newCate}
{news[1].newTitle}
{news[1].newContent.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, '')}
read more...
} { news[2] &&
{news[2].newCate}
{news[2].newTitle}
{news[2].newContent.replace(/<[^>]+>/g, '')}
read more...
}
}
) }
